revised_title: Vascular System and Blood Vessels of Mustelus antarcticus
tldr: The author examines the blood vessels and vascular system of Mustelus antarcticus, comparing them with other elasmobranchs and embryonic trunks of vertebrates. The study provides a detailed account of the arteries and veins, their functions, and their connections, as well as a classification of the veins and their systems. This research contributes to the understanding of the vascular system in vertebrates.
